page.title: 15Leisure in Maesbrook
page.content: The Public House ________________ "The Black Horse",complete with its five outside tables,is Maesbrooks only public house.Being a free house,it does not have to sell a certain type of beer or even sell beer at all! The landlady,Mrs.Linda Williams-Pugh,has only been at Maesbrook seven years.She moved from Llandudno to take over the job from her father A.E.Williams. Other Interesting Points About Maesbrook. Maesbrook has one post box and one telephone box. The post box has four collections at the following times: Monday to Friday - 8.00 a.m. - 4.00 p.m. Saturday - 8.00 a.m. Good Friday - 8.00 a.m.
